headline: Perfect Day secures Series C funding
summary: Secures major investment to scale production of precision-fermentation dairy proteins.

headline: MycoWorks partners with Adidas
summary: Releases new line of mycelium-based leather for Adidas footwear.

headline: Redefine Meat expands to US market
summary: 3D-printed vegan meat alternative enters major US grocery chains.

headline: Modern Meadow unveils biofabricated leather
summary: New biofabricated leather offers superior durability and sustainability.

headline: Impossible Foods launches new vegan sausage
summary: New product uses improved fermentation techniques for enhanced flavor.

headline: Notpla secures EU funding for seaweed packaging
summary: Significant investment boosts seaweed-based plastic alternative production.

headline: Geltor partners with Unilever for vegan collagen
summary: Precision fermentation collagen used in Unilever's new beauty products.

headline: BioMason receives grant for bio-cement
summary: Government funding accelerates development of sustainable bio-cement.

headline: Clara Foods announces egg white expansion
summary: Expands production capacity for its precision-fermentation egg whites.

headline: Pangaia launches new line of mushroom leather
summary: New clothing line features sustainable mushroom-based leather alternative.
